mapper.insert: insert into user_answer_record (naire_id, user_id, create_time, submit_time, update_time, delete_flag, content) values (#{naireId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{submitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

naire_id,
user_id,
create_time,
submit_time,
update_time,
delete_flag,
content,

mapper.update:
update user_answer_record
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
submit_time = #{submitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where naire_id = #{naireId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from user_answer_record a
where ${where}
